patents.title: Bolt conversion apparatus for firearm and upper receiver for the same
patents.abstract: A bolt conversion apparatus for a firearm and upper receiver for the same. The bolt conversion apparatus is removably attached to an upper receiver of a firearm and includes a receiver attachment portion and a bolt carrier portion. The receiver attachment portion is provided for attaching the bolt conversion apparatus to the upper receiver of the firearm.

patents.title: Extendable tang for a firearm
patents.abstract: An extendable tang for a firearm that provides a more comfortable and stable grip for the user. The extendable tang includes mechanisms that allow it to be deployed when needed and retracted when not in use.

patents.title: Revolver louver
patents.abstract: A revolver louver system that provides improved ventilation and cooling for firearms during operation. The system includes specialized louvers that direct air flow while maintaining structural integrity.

patents.title: Firearm handgrip with tool component
patents.abstract: A firearm handgrip with an integrated tool component that allows users to perform maintenance and adjustments in the field without requiring separate tools.

patents.title: Fixed stock with integral storage
patents.abstract: A fixed stock for a firearm that includes integrated storage compartments for ammunition, maintenance tools, and other accessories.
